Dialogue.Page: It's good to see you again.
You are standing in a newly-created galaxy. It was formed by those banjo bandits you've been chasing down.
My magic banjo had the power to create an entire galaxy. Who knew?
Yes, it is. It was my magic banjo, once. Now it's part of the newly-formed Banjo Galaxy.
No, not really. I just wanted to get my banjo back.
I only used it to write sick new music.
But that's a funny thing about the universe. It does what it wants, no matter what we do.
What's happened here is merely a moment in time. A point in an ever-expanding tree of possibilities.
Who's to say that in another galaxy there is a giant dulcimer above our heads? Or perhaps a picklo?
We just happened to stumble upon the place with you, me, and a giant magical banjo.
Do you understand what I am saying, friend? Be curious, be creative, and keep exploring.
I'm thrilled to imagine all of the amazing journys that are out there waiting for you.
